resources.string: %1$s is now turned off. Would you like to turn on this SIM card?
%1$s is now turned off. Would you like to turn off the flight mode and turn on this SIM card?
Flight mode is on. Would you like to turn off the flight mode?
Airplane mode is now turned on, would you like to turn off?
The selected SIM card is now locked.Please unlock it first.
The selected SIM slot is now locked.Please unlock it first.
The fixed dialing numbers is enabled.
The SIM card that you are about to use is now roaming. No local SIM is available now. Would you like to continue?
The SIM card that you are about to use is now roaming. Would you like to continue via the local SIM?
You cancel this action on the roaming SIM
SIM card has been permanently locked
The slot has been permanently locked
